sentence.Network_en: There is a useful bibliography at the end of each chapter.
sentence.Network_cn: 在每一章后附有一份有用的参考书目.

sentence.Network_en: A scholastic work is to have a useful bibliography at the end of each chapter or the whole book.
sentence.Network_cn: 学术著作应该在每一章或全书之后附有一份参考书目.

sentence.Network_en: At the end of this chapter there is a select bibliography of useful books.
sentence.Network_cn: 本章末尾列有一份有用的精选书目。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French bibliographie or modern Latin bibliographia, from Greek biblion 'book' + -graphia 'writing'

entry.def: A bibliography is a list of books on a particular subject.

example.ex: At the end of this chapter there is a select bibliography of useful books.
example.tran: 本章末尾列有一份有用的精选书目。

entry.tran: （参考或引证的）文献目录，参考书目
entry.def: A bibliography is a list of the books and articles that are referred to in a particular book.

means.word_mean: 1. a list of writings with time and place of publication (such as the writings of a single author or the works referred to in preparing a document etc.)
